member.name: P:Rebex.Common.MscorlibVersion
member.summary:
Gets version of the mscorlib assembly.
If the version cannot be somehow retrieved, returns object (so never retuns null).

member.name: T:Rebex.Messages
member.summary: Provides methods for constructing exception messages.

member.name: T:Rebex.RebexAsyncResult
member.summary: Universal class for asynchronous method invocation.

member.name: M:Rebex.RebexAsyncResult.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios. If disposing equals true, the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed. If disposing equals false, the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.
member.param: If true, is called by IDisposable.Dispose. Otherwise it is called by finalizer.

member.name: M:Rebex.RebexAsyncResult.Dispose
member.summary: Implementation of IDisposable.Dispose()

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Ssh
member.summary: Provides methods for communication with SSH shell servers.
member.remarks: All members of this class are thread-safe.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Ssh.DefaultPort
member.summary: Default SSH port (22).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Ssh class.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the object and all the socket objects.
member.remarks: Calling this method ensures that all resources are freed. It is not necessary to call this method if the SSH session is successfully closed using Disconnect method.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizer. Called by garbage collector during object destruction.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Connect(System.String)
member.summary: Connects to the SSH server.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string address.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects to the SSH server.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string address.
The server port (eg. 22).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Connect(System.String,System.Int32,Rebex.Net.SshParameters)
member.summary: Connects to the SSH server with the specified security parameters.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string IP address.
The server port (eg. 22).
Security parameters.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Disconnect
member.summary: Informs the server that the connection is about to close and terminates the connection.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Login
member.summary: Authenticates the user to the server interactively and initializes the SSH session. Uses event to request credentials.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Login(System.String)
member.summary: Authenticates the user to the server interactively and initializes the SSH session. Uses event to request credentials.
member.param: The username (optional).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Login(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Authenticates the user to the server and initializes the SSH session.
member.param: The username.
Password for the specified username.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Login(System.String,Rebex.Net.SshPrivateKey)
member.summary: Authenticates the user to the server using his private key and initializes the SSH session.
member.param: The username.
RSA or DSA private key for key-based authentication.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Login(System.String,System.String,Rebex.Net.SshPrivateKey)
member.summary: Authenticates the user to the server using a combination of password and public key and initializes the SSH session.
member.param: The username.
Password for the specified username.
RSA or DSA private key for key-based authentication.
member.remarks: Please note that some servers don't support both password and private key specified at the same time.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Login(Rebex.Net.SshGssApiCredentials)
member.summary: Authenticates to the server using GSSAPI. Kerberos and NTLM methods are supported.
member.param: Credentials.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Bind(Rebex.Net.SshSession)
member.summary: Binds the object to an underlying SSH session. This can be used instead of / methods.
member.param: SSH session (already connected and authenticated).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Ssh.StartOutgoingTunnel(System.Net.IPEndPoint,System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Starts a new outgoing tunnel. Connections to local endpoint will be tunneled through the SSH server to the specified remote endpoint.
member.param: Local endpoint to listen at.
Target endpoint to which to tunnel connections.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.Ssh.BannerReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a banner message is received from the server.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.Ssh.FingerprintCheck
member.summary: Occurs when a fingerprint is received from the server and needs to be validated.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.Ssh.AuthenticationRequest
member.summary: Occurs when an authentication request is received from the server that cannot be answered programmatically.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the object is disposed.
member.value: True if disposed; false if not disposed.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the session is connected.

remarks.p: This property returns the latest known state of the session. When it returns false, the session was either never connected, or no longer connected. When it returns true, the session was connected at the time of the last I/O operation.
Note: There is no guarantee that the session is still connected even though returns true.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.IsAuthenticated
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the session is authenticated.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the network proxy to use to access a remote server.
member.value: The to use to access a remote server.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.LogWriter
member.summary: Gets or sets the logger used by this object.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the Encoding to use to encode and decode command parameters and server responses.
member.value: The Encoding to use to encode and decode command parameters and server responses. Default is Encoding.Default.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time in milliseconds before the operation times out (specify -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out).
member.value: The length of time, in milliseconds, until the operation times out, or the value -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out. Default is 60000 (60 seconds).

remarks.p: The internal timeout counter is reset every time data is sent or received from the server. This also means that data transfers only time out after x milliseconds of inactivity, not after x milliseconds from the start of the transfer.
Minimal value is 1000. Setting this to a value lower than 1000 will set it to 1000.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Fingerprint
member.summary: Gets the server public key fingerprint.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Session
member.summary: Gets the SSH session used by this SSH session.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.LocalEndPoint
member.summary: Gets the local client .

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.RemoteEndPoint
member.summary: Gets the remote server .

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets SSH object settings.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Ssh.Version
member.summary: Gets the version of the SSH component.
member.value: The version of the SSH component.

member.name: T:Rebex.Legacy.SshExtensions
member.summary: Extension class for Ssh.

member.name: M:Rebex.Legacy.SshExtensions.BeginConnect(Rebex.Net.Ssh,System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins asynchronous Connect operation. Connects to the SSH server.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string address.

remarks.p: In builds for .NET 4.0 and higher, this method is available as an extension method. Add 'using Rebex.Legacy' (C#) or 'Import Rebex.Legacy' (VB.NET) to your code in order to use it.

member.param: An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
Instance of Ssh.
member.returns: An that references the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.SshConnectionState
member.summary: Represents the Ssh object connection state.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SshConnectionState.Connected
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the object is connected.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SshConnectionState.NativeErrorCode
member.summary: Gets the Win32 socket error code.
member.remarks: Returns 0 if no socket error code is available.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.SshSettings
member.summary: Specifies various SSH settings.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SshSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SshSettings.Clone
member.summary: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
member.returns: A new object that is a copy of the current instance.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SshSettings.SshParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets SSH session parameters.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SshSettings.RaiseEventsFromCurrentThread
member.summary: Specifies whether to raise asynchronous events from the current working thread or whether to raise them using a available when an asynchronous operation was started.
member.value: False (default) to raise events using ; true to raise them directly form the current working thread.
member.remarks: Events of synchronous methods are always raised from the current working thread.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SshSettings.WaitForServerWelcomeMessage
member.summary: Wait for server SSH protocol welcome message before sending the client one.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SshSettings.TryPasswordFirst
member.summary: When authenticating using both password and private key, try password authentication first (default is to try the private key first).

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SshSettings.PostponeChannelClose
member.summary: Postpone channel close requests (workaround for older versions of ssh.com and Cisco SSH servers).
member.remarks: Not supported on Windows store Apps platfors.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SshSettings.EnableSignaturePadding
member.summary: Enable padding of RSA private key signatures (workaround for SSH servers that got the padding wrong).
member.value: True to enable signature padding; false to disable it.

member.name: T:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl
member.summary: SSH terminal emulator control.

member.name: M:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.OnConnected(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: An that contains the event data.

member.name: M:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.OnDisconnected(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: An that contains the event data.

member.name: M:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of SSH terminal control.

member.name: M:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.Connect
member.summary: Connects to the SSH server specified by and properties and authenticates using the credential specified by , and properties.

member.name: M:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects from the SSH server.

member.name: M:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.BeginConnect(System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins asynchronous Connect operation. Connects to the SSH server specified by and properties and authenticates using the credential specified by , and properties.
member.param: An optional asynchronous callback to be called when the operation is complete.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An that references the asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Begins asynchronous Connect operation. Connects to the SSH server specified by and properties and authenticates using the credential specified by , and properties.
member.param: An optional user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Ends an asynchronous BeginConnect operation.
member.param: Stores state information for this asynchronous operation as well as any user defined data.

member.name: P:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the network proxy to use to access a remote server.
member.value: The to use to access a remote server.

member.name: P:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.ServerName
member.summary: Gets or sets the server address - either a hostname or a dotted string IP address.

member.name: P:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.ServerPort
member.summary: Gets or sets the server port. Default value is 22.

member.name: P:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.ServerParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the SSH security parameters.

member.name: P:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.UserName
member.summary: Gets or sets the username to be used to authenticate to the server.

member.name: P:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.UserPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the password to be used to authenticate to the server.

member.name: P:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.UserPrivateKey
member.summary: RSA or DSA private key for key-based authentication.

member.name: P:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.Fingerprint
member.summary: Gets the server public key fingerprint.

member.name: P:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.

member.name: P:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.LogWriter
member.summary: Gets or sets the logger used by this object.

member.name: E:Rebex.TerminalEmulation.SshTerminalControl.Connected
member.summary: Occurs when connected to the server.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.SshTunnel
member.summary: Represents an active SSH tunnel.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SshTunnel.Close
member.summary: Closes the tunnel. Stops new connections from being accepted, but leaves the current connections active.
